org.wildfly.security.http.util.sso

Class DefaultSingleSignOnManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.http.util.sso.DefaultSingleSignOnManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SingleSignOnManager

    public class DefaultSingleSignOnManager
extends Object
implements SingleSignOnManager
    SingleSignOnManager based on a ConcurrentMap of DefaultSingleSignOnEntry instances.
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro
